msg.name: mzdyVystupOzuspojNeniOsszKod

msg.name: mzdyPlatiOdPrvniho
msg.titl: ###Nastavení by mělo být platné od 1. dne v měsíci. Výpočet mezd používá nastavení, které je platné k 1. dni v měsíci. Změna v průběhu měsíce se neprojeví ve výpočtu mezd a ve mzdových výstupech."

msg.name: mzdyVypocetNastaveniDetiVarov
msg.titl: If the employee applies tax advantages for children,\nit is necessary to carry out new configuration, so that the deduction occurs in accordance with valid legislation.

msg.name: mzdyVypocetExistsSlozkyUkoncene24
msg.titl:
###Ve mzdách pro %p/%p jsou zadány složky, které byly od roku 2024 nahrazeny novými.
V případě, že jsou složky zadány ve srážkách je třeba jim ukončit platnost ke konci předchozího měsíce a nové složky zadat ve stálých mzdových složkách.

Nalezeny byly tyto složky:

msg.name: mzdyVypocetExistsSlozkyUkoncene24Slozka
msg.titl: ###- %p - nahrazena složkou %p\n

msg.name: mzdyVypocetExistsSlozkyUkoncene24PenPojZamZrusena
msg.titl: ###- %p - rozdělena na: PENZIJ. POJ. DOPLŇ., PENZIJ. POJ. INST., PENZIJ.POJ.STAT\n

msg.name: mzdyVypocetExistsSlozkyUkoncene24PenPojZrusena
msg.titl: ###- %p - rozdělena na: PŘÍSP.PEN.POJ.DOPLŇ, PŘÍSP.PEN.POJ.INSTIT, PŘÍSP.PEN.POJ.STAT\n

msg.name: mzdyVypocetExistsSlozkyUkoncene24PenPojProcZrusena
msg.titl: ###- %p - rozdělena na: PŘÍSP.PEN.POJ.DOPL.%, PŘÍSP.PEN.POJ.INST.%, PŘÍSP.PEN.POJ.STAT %\n

msg.name: mzdyVypocetUpozorneniZapnutiProminutiSPFirma
msg.titl: For the period of June - August 2020 it is possible, if the legal conditions are met, to use the social insurance waiver for the company. The waiver must be activated prior to wage calculation by selecting the "%p" option in the settings for individual types of employment effective from 1 June 2020 (or later). P It may also be activated in bulk for all standard types of employees using a service in Human Resources. Continue with the wage calculation?

msg.name: mzdyVypocetUpozorneniVypnutiProminutiSPFirma
msg.titl: For the period of čJune - August 2020 it is possible, if the legal conditions are met, to use the social insurance waiver for the company. If the waiver was activated in the employment settings, it must be deactivated by 1 September 2020 at the latest. It may be deactivated using a bulk service in Human Resources. Continue with wage calculation?

msg.name: mzdyVypocetNastaveniDruhyPilirVarov
msg.titl: In view of the cancellation of pillar II as at 1/1/2016 it is necessary for employees who have been participants in pillar II to add in the HR section new employee settings and to cancel pillar II (HR - Wage parameters - Social insurance - Participant in retirement savings).\n\nContinuation will lead to an erroneous calculation of social insurance.

msg.name: mzdyVypocetInfoOdmenyPrepocet
msg.titl: Wage components with an impact on PPP calculation were updated.\nIf you used multi-month remuneration during the previous year and you have calculated wages in the current year, calculate for the correct PPP wage.

msg.name: mzdyVypocetDovolena2021Info
msg.titl:
To calculate the holiday in 2021 correctly, you need to set the number of holiday hours on the employment relationship in HR.
You can use the new service "Pre-fill holiday hours" and then use the payroll calculation in Payroll Update.
In case of transferring holiday from the previous year, you need to add a folder "Transfer of holiday from 2020 to 2021" in January 
and fill in the hours and select that it is a user time change.
To add this folder you can use the service "Pre-fill the number of hours of transferred leave" in Payroll Update.
After adding this folder you need to recalculate the payroll.
When calculating the pay for January we recommend to check the hours in the field "Remaining leave"
, "Transfer of leave from last year" and "Transfer of leave from 2020 to 2021".

msg.name: mzdyVypocetLicenceNespocteno
msg.titl: Wages for %p of people were not calculated.\nLicence permits wages calculation for maximum %p persons monthly.

msg.name: mzdyVypocetJedneLicenceNespocteno
